text: Lemon Drop Mangosteen is a kind of tropical fruit that can be found in the Andes. The fruit looks like a dried-up lemon and is bright yellow in color. The inside of the fruit has a white pulp with a citrus taste. This taste has been compared to cotton candy that tastes like lemons. == Other websites == *Garcinia (previously Rheedia) madruno Category:Tropical fruit Category:Malpighiales
title: Lemon Drop Mangosteen
